name: OR_PAT_OPERATED_DIFF_HOSP
description: Table for the Patient Operated in Different Hospital (Free Text) (I ORC 7906) item.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the case request record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PAT_DIFF_HOSP_FT
columns.description: This field indicates whether or not the patient was operated on at a different hospital.
